dashboard.title: My Data
dashboard.h2: Please enter your personal data and press continue
dashboard.name: Name *

checkoutPayment.title: Payment
checkoutPayment.h2: After making the payment you will receive a confirmation email with details of your purchase
checkoutPayment.p: You will be redirected to a secure payment platform. This is a secure process. The validation of your payment can take up to 24 hours.

checkoutConfirmed.title: Order Created
checkoutConfirmed.message: Congratulations, your payment was successful. Shortly a confirmation email will arrive to your inbox
